text: Blastochloris gulmargensis is a gram-negative, motile bacteria from the genus of Blastochloris which was isolated from biofilm in a cold sulfur spring in Gulmarg in India.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Blastochloris gulmargensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Phyllobacteriaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2011
title: Blastochloris gulmargensis
